description:
Angeline finally makes it back home with her friends in tow, but Belgrieve can hardly believe his ears when he hears how she introduces him. If Angeline says he`s the Red Ogre and he says he`s not, then which story is really true?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Quiet Days in Turnera with the Occasional Family Spat
Turnera no Odayaka na Nichijou, Tokidoki Oyako Genka
トルネラの穏やかな日常, 時々親子喧嘩
